bibl.title: Aphrodite from Paphos and from Egypt.
Cyprus and the East Mediterranean in the Iron Age. Proceedings of the Seventh British Museum Classical Colloquium, April 1988
bibl.author: Daszewski, W.A.

bibl.note: Compares a bronze statuette from Egypt [C.C. Edgar, Cat. gén. des ant. ég. du Musée du Caire. Greek Bronzes (Le Caire, 1904) p. 62, No. 27873] with a marble statue from Nea Paphos.
bibl.seg: Daszewski W.A., Aphrodite from Paphos and from Egypt.
Veronica Tatton-Brown (Ed.), Cyprus and the East Mediterranean in the Iron Age. Proceedings of the Seventh British Museum Classical Colloquium, April 1988 (London, 1989) pp. 122-131, 8 figg.
